sense.gloss: guest seating (e.g. theater, stadium), passenger seat (e.g. taxi)

sdata.j: ↑観客↑↓かん|きゃく↓↑席↑↓せき|↓の↑最↑↓さい↓↑前列↑↓ぜんれつ↓に↑席↑↓せき↓を↑予約↑↓よやく↓したわ。
sdata.e: I've staked out places for us in the front row of the auditorium.

sdata.j: このお↑庭↑↓にわ↓の↑方↑↓ほう↓にね。↑縁台↑↓えんだい↓を↑出↑↓だ↓して↑客席↑↓|きゃくせき|↓を↑増↑↓ふ↓やしたいんです。こんな↑感↑↓かん↓じに。
sdata.e: In the garden, you know. I'd like to put out benches and increase the customer seating. Like this ...
